<p>

This interactive map explores the <a href="http://oxrep.classics.ox.ac.uk" target="_blank">Oxford Roman Economy Project</a>’s <a href="http://oxrep.classics.ox.ac.uk/databases/shipwrecks_database/" target="_blank">Shipwrecks Database</a>. The database aims to catalogue all known ancient wrecks in the Mediterranean up to AD 1500 to provide a basis for quantitative analysis over time. For further information visit the <a href="http://oxrep.classics.ox.ac.uk/databases/shipwrecks_database/" target="_blank">Oxford Roman Economy Project’s website</a>.

</p>
